  Note:
  ~~~~~
  This release is an addon for Batman.Arkham.Origins-RELOADED.
  It will add the Initiation addon DLC. It will also update your game to
  newest version. No previous update is required to apply this addon.

  --

  Travel back to the days before there was a BatmanÃƒâ€“ and take control of a 
  young Bruce Wayne as he completes his martial arts training. Experience 
  exotic locales including a bamboo forest and mountain-top monastery. This 
  pack contains Bruce Wayne and Vigilante skins, four challenge maps, and a 
  challenge campaign.
